Panel1.title: Helping the community
Panel1.description: By donating the items that you no longer use, it means that you are helping the Gillingham Street Angels community by putting your items in someone elses hands.

Panel1.title: Earn Money
Panel1.description: You can earn money when selling items that you no longer need. Not only are you getting rid of things that you don't need, you earn money doing so.

Panel1.title: Earn Money
Panel1.description: You can earn money when selling items that you no longer need. Not only are you getting rid of things that you don't need, you earn money doing so.
